Hace dos años el #HuracánMaria tocó tierra en #PuertoRico.

I’m proud to be the candidate for anyone who believes health care must be guaranteed as a right for all. https://twitter.com/tylerpager/status/1175118434570579968 QT @tylerpager Biden getting into a disagreement with a voter over his healthcare plan. She says his plan is protecting insurance companies’ profits. He questions whether she would pay higher taxes for it. She says yes. He responds: “You got the right candidate in Bernie.”

Today marks two years since Hurricane Maria made landfall in Puerto Rico. Almost 3,000 lives were lost in part because of a failure by the federal government to help Americans when they needed it the most. It's on us to ensure this never happens again.

Millions of Americans face mental health issues, yet not enough receive the care they need. Now is the time for Kaiser Permanente & its mental health clinicians to work together to build a new model for mental health care. No one should have to wait months to see their therapist.

With @SenatorMenendez & Rep. @NydiaVelazquez, I questioned @FEMA about delays rebuilding the hospital on the island of Vieques, that served 9,000 US citizens & was destroyed in Hurricane Maria. The next week, the agency confirmed it would be rebuilt. https://twitter.com/SenWarren/status/1131969073217196032 QT @SenWarren Last week, @SenatorMenendez, @NydiaVelazquez & I questioned @FEMA about the delays. Now, the agency has confirmed the hospital on Vieques will be rebuilt. It's a critical win for the people of Puerto Rico – and we’ll be with them every step of the way. https://twitter.com/DavidBegnaud/status/1131720803123421184

I cannot tell you how powerful young people mobilizing their parents & grandparents are in changing the game on issues & elections. We did this last yr & continue to now.

It’s twofold organizing: it expands the electorate and flips voters.

It takes multiple convos.
